title: Halo 3
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This game supports English. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". The epic saga continues with Halo 3, the hugely anticipated third chapter in the highly successful and critically acclaimed Halo franchise created by Bungie.  Master Chief returns to finish the fight, bringing the epic conflict between the Covenant, the Flood, and the entire human race to a dramatic, pulse-pounding climax. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3: 1st TV Spot Theme
childDownloads.description: Based on the action and imagery debuted in the one-time special event Halo 3 commercial, these evocative images capture the action and drama of a moment from Halo 3's single player campaign, dramatized using Hollywood-quality computer graphics and special effects. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Ad "Believe" Diorama Video (HD)
childDownloads.description: Watch the Halo 3 Ad, "Believe" Diorama.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Ad, "Making of John 117 Monument" Video (SD)
childDownloads.description: Watch the short film, "Making of John 117 Monument", a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the Halo 3 ad.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Announcement Trailer
childDownloads.description: With its defensive forces all but obliterated, Earth has fallen to the unstoppable might of the Covenant. These alien occupiers have discovered something beneath the ancient African sands - something incredible...something Forerunner.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 "Believe" Ad, Museum Video
childDownloads.description: Watch the Halo 3 "Believe" ad.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Cold Storage Map
childDownloads.description: Warmly crafted, dutifully beautified update of Halo: CE classic multiplayer map, Chill Out. Love, Bungie

childDownloads.title: Halo 3: E3 2007 Trailer
childDownloads.description: Debuted at the 2007 E3 Expo in Santa Monica, this exhilarating montage of moments from Halo 3 is the first public unveiling of Halo 3’s single player “Campaign” gameplay, showing off the brand new graphics engine and giving a revealing glimpse of the events that make up the epic conclusion to the Halo Trilogy.   The video, produced by Bungie Studios, also features the first musical performance from Halo 3, by composer Marty O’Donnell, and dozens of never before seen views of the incredible environments, characters, vehicles and weapons that define the thrilling elements of the Halo universe.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Heroic Map Pack
childDownloads.description: The Heroic map pack contains three new maps, each presenting a totally different play style. Standoff’s symmetrical valley, with its entrenched bases and fields of boulders is ideal for mid-sized objective and Slayer game types, while Rat’s Nest’s vast, labyrinthine passages bring something quite new to the Halo multiplayer experience – an indoor vehicle paradise, strongly influenced by the Campaign mode ideal for big team battles. Finally, Foundry is the ultimate Forge map – players can edit every single object in this voluminous industrial warehouse, place stairways, walls, bridges and tunnels to create an entirely new play space and build almost any kind of map they can think of. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3: In the Beginning
childDownloads.description: Take a look behind the scenes of the making of the Halo 3 announce trailer. Never-before-seen in-game footage, and fun insights from the Bungie Studios team are highlights of this short documentary piece. An 80 piece orchestra, Bungie's new graphics technology and masterful storytelling brought the Halo 3 announce trailer to the big screen at E3, 2006. This is your chance to get a little insider glimpse at the people and process that brought it all together. (English, Not Rated)

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Legendary Map Pack
childDownloads.description: The Legendary Map Pack blends old and new. Ghost Town’s asymmetrical mix of confined spaces and long lines of fire makes for frenetic games. Avalanche re-imagines the original Halo classic, Sidewinder, with new features, tweaked vehicles and massive outdoor spaces. Significant changes bring big improvements to the map, yet its contours and cliffs should provide a welcome sense of familiarity.  Blackout, on the other hand, is the purest remake to date – all time favorite Lockout gets a graphical overhaul, but retains its challenging mix of ramps, platforms, tunnels and hallways. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Legendary Map Pack Trailer: Darkness
childDownloads.description: Explore the darkness and danger of The Halo 3 Legendary Map Pack – Blackout, Avalanche and Ghost Town. Wander the catwalks and catacombs of Blackout and its vertiginous series of aeries and turrets, illuminated by the chill and baleful glare of a moonlit sky. Avalanche is colder still, and as vast as it is icy. Fly on silent wing through its valleys and caverns. Ghost Town’s ruinous abandonment and forlorn wreckage is a testament to battles past and a warning of battles to come. See all of these spectral spaces from the unique and haunting perspective of an Elite who has known both sides of the conflict.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Legendary Map ViDoc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker
childDownloads.description: Mapmaker, mapmaker make me a map! Join the actual creators of the Halo Legendary Map Pack as they take you on a guided tour of their creations. See the spaces and places they envisioned and hear where that inspiration came from and how it plays out in the Halo universe. Get a unique perspective and some solid, practical tips on how to play the latest Halo 3 multiplayer levels, Blackout, Avalanche and Ghost Town.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Mythic II Map Pack
childDownloads.description: The final three Halo 3 multiplayer maps from Halo 3: ODST make their standalone debut on Marketplace. If you’ve yet to complete the Halo 3 multiplayer set, here’s your chance.  Heretic returns players to familiar ground, Halo 2’s Midship, while Citadel forces small squads to stay in constant communication and Longshore’s multitude of industrial buildings, elevated walks, and open inlets conspire to create a complex battleground tailored for multiple combat scenarios. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Mythic Map Pack
childDownloads.description: The long-awaited Mythic Map Pack drops into Xbox LIVE Marketplace. Investigate Orbital’s abandoned hallways - before it was evacuated, the Quito Space Tether was heralded as the “Civil Engineering Monument of the Millennium.” Witness Assembly, where Scarab hulls loom overhead, being decontaminated in preparation for the city-sized Lekgolo colonies that will breathe life into the massive metal husks. An excavation site surrounded by deadly Forerunner defenses, the mysteries of Sandbox are hidden high above, deep below, and right before your eyes. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Mythic Theme (Premium)
childDownloads.description: Inspired by the Forger’s paradise, Sandbox, with nods to Assembly and Orbital, the Halo 3 Mythic Theme takes custom content to a whole new level, transforming your Xbox 360 into a sand swept playground. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Mythic Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Get the all new, revolutionary Mythic Map Pack and put some fun back into your life.  Made from Space Age polymers, the Mythic Map Pack comes with not one, not two, but three new multiplayer arenas, including the Forger’s paradise, Sandbox.  Still not convinced?  Download this Trailer and check out all the amazing features the Mythic Map Pack has to offer.  The Mythic Map Pack is available April 9, 2009.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: Download this pack of five Master Chief Halo 3 gamer tiles to show that you’re ready to Finish the Fight! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Splatter Spree Theme (Premium)
childDownloads.description: Strap yourself in for this freshly spawned, vehicular Halo 3 Theme, dropped just in time for the New Xbox LIVE Experience.  Armaments at your disposal include the UNSC Warthog, Hornet, and Mongoose, opposite the Covenant Banshee, Ghost, and Brute Chopper.  All six vehicles are included, each fueled up and ready for deployment onto the Xbox LIVE battlefield. Hold RB to flip. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Theme
childDownloads.description: As Halo 3 gets closer and closer for Xbox 360, you can mark your loyalty to the series by enhancing your 360 dashboard with this custom-built Halo 3 theme. The ruins of an embattled Earth, the vast African desert and a mysterious and ancient Forerunner object... There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 Uprising Theme
childDownloads.description: Four incredible battle scenes from the Halo 3 Uprising comic book mini-series.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 ViDoc: And on the Seven7th Day...
childDownloads.description: Bungie Day - the seventh day of the seventh month - comes once a year. This year, celebrate Bungie Day with a slew of content on Xbox LIVE Marketplace including Cold Storage, an update of Halo: Combat Evolved multiplayer classic, Chill Out. In this ViDoc, explore the mysteries and realities of Cold Storage in this Bungie-guided tour of a map where a Flood outbreak forced a premature evacuation. The emptied Forerunner research facility serves as a grim reminder of how even the best laid plans can fail. Warmly crafted, dutifully beautified update of Halo: CE classic multiplayer map, Chill Out. Love, Bungie

childDownloads.title: Halo 3: ViDoc "Cinema Paradiso"
childDownloads.description: Take a closer look at two of Halo 3’s coolest features. The Forge map and object editor lets you recreate Halo 3 multiplayer maps to suit your style, or cooperate with up to eight other players to build a new game experience. Saved Films let you replay your games, Campaign or Multiplayer, from any angle, with near complete control over the 3D camera and DVD-like functionality. Both features are explained clearly in this in-depth feature, with input and commentary from Bungie and the game designers.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3: ViDoc "Is Quisnam Protero Damno!" Trailer
childDownloads.description: Dive deep into the planning, process and personalities behind Halo 3's incredible new multiplayer game. Glimpse new levels, new techniques and new features from what's destined to be one of the most-played games of the decade, online and off.

childDownloads.title: Halo 3 ViDoc: Journey's End
childDownloads.description: Follow the Master Chief in his fight against the Covenant as he uncovers Halo and battles to unravel the mystery behind it. On a journey from the Pillar of Autumn to the portals of High Charity, he will encounter not one enemy but many: A terrible army occupies Earth, a vicious parasite is loosed on the galaxy, an ancient alien doomsday weapon is primed and ready to fire... And mankind’s survival hinges on the remaining few.

childDownloads.title: Halo: Arms Race
childDownloads.description: A unique collaboration between Bungie Studios, WETA and acclaimed director, Neill Blomkamp, this short feature shows the gritty and terrifying reality of a war machine that cannot afford to stop for any reason – even if that reason is the impending destruction of Earth. Watch UNSC Marines and ODSTs prepare for the Covenant onslaught, and see the machines and weapons of Halo as they’ve never been seen before.  A fascinating and enigmatic look at the people, places and events that come together to illustrate the Halo universe, from a perspective that will force you to believe.

childDownloads.title: Halo Camo Top
childDownloads.description: Buy this Halo Camo Top from the Halo collection!  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Halo Cargo Shorts
childDownloads.description: Buy these Standard Issue Cargo Shorts from the Halo collection! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
